title: Limits and continuity in topological spaces

blocks.name: ccn
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of continuous functions between topologies.
blocks.origin: const class ccn { Cn }

blocks.name: diff.ccn.s
diff.ccn.c
diff.ccn.w
ccnp
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of functions between topologies continuous at a given point.
blocks.origin: const class ccnp { CnP }

blocks.name: diff.ccnp.s
diff.ccnp.c
diff.ccnp.w
clm
blocks.content: Extend class notation with a function on topological spaces whose value is the convergence relation for limit sequences in the space.
blocks.origin: const class clm { ~~>t }

blocks.name: diff.clm.s
diff.clm.c
diff.clm.w
df-cn
blocks.content: Define a function on two topologies whose value is the set of continuous mappings from the first topology to the second. Based on definition of continuous function in [Munkres] p. 102. See ~ iscn for the predicate form. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccn, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, crab(s2, co(cuni(cv(s1)), cmap, cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), cv(s3)), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ Cn =(s0 ∈ Top, s1 ∈ Top ↦ { s2 ∈(⋃ s1[↦]⋃ s0)| ∀(s3 ∈ s1,(`' s2 " s3)∈ s0)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-cnp
blocks.content: Define a function on two topologies whose value is the set of continuous mappings at a specified point in the first topology. Based on Theorem 7.2(g) of [Munkres] p. 107. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cnp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(ccnp, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, cmpt(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), crab(s3, co(cuni(cv(s1)), cmap, cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s4, cv(s1), wi(wcel(cfv(cv(s3), cv(s2)), cv(s4)), wrex(s5, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s5)), wss(cima(cv(s3), cv(s5)), cv(s4))))))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cnp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ CnP =(s0 ∈ Top, s1 ∈ Top ↦(s2 ∈ ⋃ s0 ↦ { s3 ∈(⋃ s1[↦]⋃ s0)| ∀(s4 ∈ s1,((s3 ` s2)∈ s4 → ∃(s5 ∈ s0,(s2 ∈ s5 ∧(s3 " s5)⊆ s4))))}))
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-lm
blocks.content: Define a function on topologies whose value is the convergence relation for sequences into the given topological space. Although ` f ` is typically a sequence (a function from an upperset of integers) with values in the topological space, it need not be. Note, however, that the limit property concerns only values at integers, so that the real-valued function ` ( x e. RR |-> ( sin `` ( _pi x. x ) ) ) ` converges to zero (in the standard topology on the reals) with this definition. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(clm, cmpt(s0, ctop, copab(s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), co(cuni(cv(s0)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s2), cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s3, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wrex(s4, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s1), cv(s4)), cv(s4), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-lm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ ~~>t =(s0 ∈ Top ↦ { < s1, s2 > |(s1 ∈(⋃ s0[p↦]ℂ)∧ s2 ∈ ⋃ s0 ∧ ∀(s3 ∈ s0,(s2 ∈ s3 → ∃(s4 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((s1 |` s4): s4 → s3)))))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: lmrel
blocks.content: The topological space convergence relation is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmrel(class c0) {
  |- wrel(cfv(clm, c0))
} = {
  relmptopab(hs1, hs0, hs2, clm, c0, ctop, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs3, cv(hs1), wi(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wrex(hs4, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs4)), cv(hs4), cv(hs3)))))))
  df-lm(hs1, hs0, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmrel(class c0) {
  ⊢ Rel((~~>t ` c0))
} = {
  relmptopab(hs1, hs0, hs2, clm, c0, ctop, (hs0 ∈(⋃ hs1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs2 ∈ ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(hs3 ∈ hs1,(hs2 ∈ hs3 → ∃(hs4 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs4): hs4 → hs3))))))
  df-lm(hs1, hs0, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
}

blocks.name: lmrcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for the convergence relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, ctop))
} = {
  sseldi(c1, ctop, cdm(clm), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2))
  dmmptss(hs0, clm, ctop, copab(hs1, hs2, w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wrex(hs4, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(hs1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs4), cv(hs3))))))))
  df-lm(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cdm(clm)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(clm, c1)))
  df-br(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2)
  elfvdm(cop(c0, c2), clm, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2 → c1 ∈ Top)
} = {
  sseldi(c1, ctop, dom(~~>t), c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2)
  dmmptss(hs0, clm, ctop, { < hs1, hs2 > |(hs1 ∈(⋃ hs0[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs2 ∈ ⋃ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs3 ∈ hs0,(hs2 ∈ hs3 → ∃(hs4 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs1 |` hs4): hs4 → hs3)))))})
  df-lm(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  sylbi(c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2, c1 ∈ dom(~~>t), < c0, c2 > ∈(~~>t ` c1))
  df-br(c0, (~~>t ` c1), c2)
  elfvdm(< c0, c2 >, clm, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
}

blocks.name: lmfval
blocks.content: The relation "sequence ` f ` converges to point ` y ` " in a metric space. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cfv(clm, c0), copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {

  fvmptd2(hs0, clm, c0, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), ctop, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), universe, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))

  opabbidv(s0, s1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2)))))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))
  3anbi123d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpm, cc), co(c1, cpm, cc), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  oveq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpm, cc, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))

  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))

  raleqdv(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2)))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), universe), wss(copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), cxp(co(c1, cpm, cc), c1)), wcel(cxp(co(c1, cpm, cc), c1), universe))
  eqsstri(copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), cxp(co(c1, cpm, cc), c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2)))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))
  opabssxp(s0, s1, co(c1, cpm, cc), c1, wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cxp(co(c1, cpm, cc), c1), universe), wcel(co(c1, cpm, cc), universe), wcel(c1, c0))
  ovex(c1, cpm, cc)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  xpexg(co(c1, cpm, cc), universe, c1, c0)
  ssexg(copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), cxp(co(c1, cpm, cc), c1), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))

blocks.pretty:
thm lmfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(~~>t ` c0)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((s0 |` s3): s3 → s2)))))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {

thm cnfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wceq(co(c0, ccn, c2), crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, ccn, c2, crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))), ctop, ctop, crab(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wceq(ccn, cmpo(hs0, hs1, ctop, ctop, crab(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))))
  df-cn(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  rabeqbidv(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0))), co(c3, cmap, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0)))
  oveq12d(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0)), c3, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  eqtr4d(cuni(cv(hs1)), c3, cuni(c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  unieqd(cv(hs1), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)))
  toponuni(c2, c3)
  eqtr4d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  unieqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  raleqbidv(s1, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  eleq2d(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, ctop))
  topontop(c2, c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))), universe))
  rabex(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0)))
  ovex(c3, cmap, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))))
  diff.co.s(s0, cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cv(hs1))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cmap, c1)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c3)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c3)
  diff.ctopon.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

thm cnfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))→(c0[Cn]c2)= { s0 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(`' s0 " s1)∈ c0)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, ccn, c2, { s0 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(`' s0 " s1)∈ c0)}, ctop, ctop, { s0 ∈(⋃ hs1[↦]⋃ hs0)| ∀(s1 ∈ hs1,(`' s0 " s1)∈ hs0)}, universe, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)))
  a1i((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), Cn =(hs0 ∈ Top, hs1 ∈ Top ↦ { s0 ∈(⋃ hs1[↦]⋃ hs0)| ∀(s1 ∈ hs1,(`' s0 " s1)∈ hs0)}))
  df-cn(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  rabeqbidv(s0, (⋃ hs1[↦]⋃ hs0), (c3[↦]c1), ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)), ∀(s1 ∈ hs1,(`' s0 " s1)∈ hs0), ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(`' s0 " s1)∈ c0))
  oveq12d(⋃ hs1, cmap, ⋃ hs0, c3, c1, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  eqtr4d(⋃ hs1, c3, ⋃ c2, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  unieqd(hs1, c2, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), c3 = ⋃ c2)
  toponuni(c2, c3)
  eqtr4d(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  unieqd(hs0, c0, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), c1 = ⋃ c0)
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  raleqbidv(s1, hs1, c2, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)), (`' s0 " s1)∈ hs0, (`' s0 " s1)∈ c0)
  simprr((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  eleq2d((`' s0 " s1), hs0, c0, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  simprl((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c0 ∈ Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c2 ∈ Top)
  topontop(c2, c3)
  a1i((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), { s0 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(`' s0 " s1)∈ c0)} ∈ 𝕌)
  rabex(s0, (c3[↦]c1), ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(`' s0 " s1)∈ c0))
  ovex(c3, cmap, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(`' s0 " s1)∈ c0)})
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(`' s0 " s1)∈ c0)})
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)))
  diff.co.s(s0, ⋃ hs1, cmap, ⋃ hs0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, hs1)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cmap, c1)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (TopOn ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, (TopOn ` c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c3)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))

thm cnpfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))→(c0[CnP]c2)=(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2))))}))

  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, ccnp, c2, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2))))}), ctop, ctop, (s0 ∈ ⋃ hs0 ↦ { s1 ∈(⋃ hs1[↦]⋃ hs0)| ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2))))}), universe, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)))
  a1i((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), CnP =(hs0 ∈ Top, hs1 ∈ Top ↦(s0 ∈ ⋃ hs0 ↦ { s1 ∈(⋃ hs1[↦]⋃ hs0)| ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2))))})))
  df-cnp(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  mpteq12dv(s0, ⋃ hs0, { s1 ∈(⋃ hs1[↦]⋃ hs0)| ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2))))}, c1, { s1 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2))))}, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  rabeqbidv(s1, (⋃ hs1[↦]⋃ hs0), (c3[↦]c1), ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)), ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2)))), ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2)))))
  oveq12d(⋃ hs1, cmap, ⋃ hs0, c3, c1, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  eqtr4d(⋃ hs1, c3, ⋃ c2, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  unieqd(hs1, c2, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), c3 = ⋃ c2)
  toponuni(c2, c3)
  eqtr4d(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)))

  raleqbidv(s2, hs1, c2, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2)), ((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2))), ((s1 ` s0)∈ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧(s1 " s3)⊆ s2))))
  simprr((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)

thm iscn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wb(wcel(c4, co(c0, ccn, c2)), wa(wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(c4, co(c0, ccn, c2)), wa(wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(c4, crab(hs0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0)))))
  eleq2d(c4, co(c0, ccn, c2), crab(hs0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))))
  cnfval(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(c4, crab(hs0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0)))), wa(wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wcel(c4, co(c3, cmap, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0))))
  elrab(hs0, c4, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0)))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0))

  cnveq(cv(hs0), c4)
  anbi1d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(c4, co(c3, cmap, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0)), wf(c4, c1, c3))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, co(c3, cmap, c1)), wf(c4, c1, c3)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c0))
  toponmax(c2, c3)

thm iscn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))→(c4 ∈(c0[Cn]c2)↔((c4 : c1 → c3)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c4 " s0)∈ c0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), c4 ∈(c0[Cn]c2), ((c4 : c1 → c3)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c4 " s0)∈ c0)), c4 ∈ { hs0 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' hs0 " s0)∈ c0)})
  eleq2d(c4, (c0[Cn]c2), { hs0 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' hs0 " s0)∈ c0)}, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)))
  cnfval(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5bb((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), c4 ∈ { hs0 ∈(c3[↦]c1)| ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' hs0 " s0)∈ c0)}, ((c4 : c1 → c3)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c4 " s0)∈ c0)), (c4 ∈(c3[↦]c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c4 " s0)∈ c0)))
  elrab(hs0, c4, (c3[↦]c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' hs0 " s0)∈ c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c4 " s0)∈ c0))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c4, (`' hs0 " s0)∈ c0, (`' c4 " s0)∈ c0)
  eleq1d((`' hs0 " s0), c0, (`' c4 " s0), hs0 = c4)
  imaeq1d(`' hs0, s0, `' c4, hs0 = c4)
  cnveq(hs0, c4)
  anbi1d((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), c4 ∈(c3[↦]c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c4 " s0)∈ c0), (c4 : c1 → c3))
  syl2anr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), (c4 ∈(c3[↦]c1)↔(c4 : c1 → c3)), c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c0)
  toponmax(c2, c3)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  elmapg(c3, c2, c1, c0, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c3[↦]c1))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c4 " s0)∈ c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  syl5ibr((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), c4 ∈((c0[CnP]c2)` c5), (c4 : c1 → c3), (c4 : ⋃ c0 → ⋃ c2))

  sylan9bb(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), (c4 : c1 → c3), (c4 : ⋃ c0 → ⋃ c2), (c4 : ⋃ c0 → c3))

thm tgcn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  impbid(w0, wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1)), wral(s0, c5, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1)))

  ralrimdva(hs0, c2, w0, wral(s0, c5, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wral(s0, c5, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wral(s0, c5, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1)), wex(hs1, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))))))
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c5)))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(ctg, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c5)), wex(hs1, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c5, ctb))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c5, ctb), wcel(cfv(ctg, c5), ctop))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(ctg, c5), ctop, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  topontop(c2, c4)
  tgclb(c5)
  eltg3(hs1, c5, ctb, cv(hs0))

  syl5ibrcom(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c5)), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))), wi(wral(s0, c5, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1)), wi(wral(s0, c5, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(ciun(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0))), c1)))

  iunopn(s0, c1, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)))

  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1, ciun(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))))
  syl6eq(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), ciun(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(c0), cuni(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0))
  imauni(s0, ccnv(c0), cv(hs1))
  cbvralv(hs0, s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1, cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c5, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), c1)))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1)
  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

thm tgcn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)↔((c0 : c3 → c4)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(TopOn ` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(topGen ` c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(TopOn ` c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2), ((c0 : c3 → c4)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)), ((c0 : c3 → c4)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)↔((c0 : c3 → c4)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1))), c1 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c4))
  iscn(s0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
  anbi2d(w0, (c0 : c3 → c4), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1))
  impbid(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1))
  syl(w0, (∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)), c5 ⊆ c2)
  sseqtr4d(c5, c2, (topGen ` c5), w0)
  syl(w0, c5 ⊆(topGen ` c5), c5 ∈ TopBases)
  bastg(c5, ctb)
  ssralv(s0, c5, c2, (`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)
  syl6ib(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1))
  ralrimdva(hs0, c2, w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1), (`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1)
  imp(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, (∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→(`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1))
  sylbid(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, (∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→(`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ⊆ c5 ∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1)))
  bitrd(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs1,(hs1 ⊆ c5 ∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1)), hs0 ∈(topGen ` c5))
  eleq2d(hs0, c2, (topGen ` c5), w0)
  syl(w0, (hs0 ∈(topGen ` c5)↔ ∃(hs1,(hs1 ⊆ c5 ∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1))), c5 ∈ TopBases)
  sylibr(w0, c5 ∈ TopBases, (topGen ` c5)∈ Top)
  eqeltrrd((topGen ` c5), ctop, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ Top, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c4))
  topontop(c2, c4)
  tgclb(c5)
  eltg3(hs1, c5, ctb, hs0)
  exlimdv(hs1, w0, (hs1 ⊆ c5 ∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1), (∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→(`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1))
  expimpd(w0, hs1 ⊆ c5, hs0 = ⋃ hs1, (∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→(`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1))
  syl5ibrcom((w0 ∧ hs1 ⊆ c5), hs0 = ⋃ hs1, (∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→(`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1), (∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→ ⋃(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0))∈ c1))
  sylan9r(w0, hs1 ⊆ c5, ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1), ⋃(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0))∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1))
  ssralv(s0, hs1, c5, (`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)
  syl(w0, (∀(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→ ⋃(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0))∈ c1), c1 ∈ Top)
  syl(w0, c1 ∈ Top, c1 ∈(TopOn ` c3))
  topontop(c1, c3)
  ex(c1 ∈ Top, ∀(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1), ⋃(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0))∈ c1)
  iunopn(s0, c1, hs1, (`' c0 " s0))
  imbi2d(hs0 = ⋃ hs1, ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1), (`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1, ⋃(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0))∈ c1)
  eleq1d((`' c0 " hs0), c1, ⋃(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0)), hs0 = ⋃ hs1)
  syl6eq((`' c0 " hs0), ⋃(s0 ∈ hs1,(`' c0 " s0)), (`' c0 " ⋃ hs1), hs0 = ⋃ hs1)
  imaeq2(hs0, ⋃ hs1, `' c0)
  imauni(s0, `' c0, hs1)
  cbvralv(hs0, s0, c2, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1, (`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)
  eleq1d((`' c0 " hs0), c1, (`' c0 " s0), hs0 = s0)
  imaeq2(hs0, s0, `' c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(ctb)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w((∀(s0 ∈ c5,(`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)→(`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((`' c0 " s0)∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (`' c0 " hs0), c1)
  diff.cima.s(s0, `' c0, hs0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c4)))

  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wa(wf(c0, c4, c5), wral(s0, c6, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))))), diffsc(s1, c6))

  impbid(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wa(wf(c0, c4, c5), wral(s0, c6, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wa(wf(c0, c4, c5), wral(s0, c6, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))), wa(wf(c0, c4, c5), wral(s0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wa(wf(c0, c4, c5), wral(s0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wcel(c3, c4))
  iscnp(s0, s1, c1, c4, c2, c5, c3, c0)
  anim2d(w0, wf(c0, c4, c5), wral(s0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))), wral(s0, c6, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  syl(w0, wi(wral(s0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))), wral(s0, c6, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))), wss(c6, c2))

  syl(w0, wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  topontop(c2, c5)

blocks.name: subbascn

blocks.name: ssidcn
blocks.content: The identity function is a continuous function from one topology to another topology on the same set iff the domain is finer than the codomain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssidcn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wb(wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, ccn, c2)), wss(c2, c0)))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, ccn, c2)), wss(c2, c0), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, ccn, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  iscn(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c1, cres(cid, c1))
  biantrur(wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)), wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  ax-mp(wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wf1o(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  f1of(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1)
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)), wss(c2, c0), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ralbidva(hs0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  syl5eq(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cima(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1))
  cnvresid(c1)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cima(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  sseqtr4d(cv(hs0), c1, cuni(c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  elssuni(cv(hs0), c2)
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

thm ssidcn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1))→((= |` c1)∈(c0[Cn]c2)↔ c2 ⊆ c0))
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)), (= |` c1)∈(c0[Cn]c2), c2 ⊆ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)∈ c0))
  syl6bbr((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)), (= |` c1)∈(c0[Cn]c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)∈ c0), (((= |` c1): c1 → c1)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)∈ c0)))
  iscn(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c1, (= |` c1))
  biantrur(∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)∈ c0), ((= |` c1): c1 → c1))
  ax-mp(((= |` c1): c1 → c1), ((= |` c1): c1 ↔ c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  f1of((= |` c1), c1, c1)
  syl6bbr((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)∈ c0), c2 ⊆ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c0))
  ralbidva(hs0, c2, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)), (`'(= |` c1)" hs0)∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1d((`'(= |` c1)" hs0), c0, hs0, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1))∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  syl5eq((`'(= |` c1)" hs0), hs0, ((= |` c1)" hs0), ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1))∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  imaeq1i(`'(= |` c1), hs0, (= |` c1))
  cnvresid(c1)
  syl(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1))∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ((= |` c1)" hs0)= hs0, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  sseqtr4d(hs0, c1, ⋃ c2, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1))∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  adantl((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)), hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c2)
  elssuni(hs0, c2)
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ∈ c2, c1 = ⋃ c2)
  toponuni(c2, c1)
  resiima(hs0, c1)
  dfss3(hs0, c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((= |` c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)))
}

thm cnpimaex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  3imp(wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4))))
  simpl2im(wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wi(wcel(c4, c2), wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4))))), wf(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wa(wf(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))))), w3a(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c3, cuni(c1))))
  iscnp2(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c4, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))), wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4))))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c4, cfv(c0, c3))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c4, cima(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c2))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm cnpimaex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈((c1[CnP]c2)` c3)∧ c4 ∈ c2 ∧(c0 ` c3)∈ c4)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ c4)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  3imp(c0 ∈((c1[CnP]c2)` c3), c4 ∈ c2, (c0 ` c3)∈ c4, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ c4)))
  simpl2im(c0 ∈((c1[CnP]c2)` c3), (c4 ∈ c2 →((c0 ` c3)∈ c4 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ c4)))), (c0 : ⋃ c1 → ⋃ c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,((c0 ` c3)∈ hs0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ hs0)))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈((c1[CnP]c2)` c3), ((c0 : ⋃ c1 → ⋃ c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,((c0 ` c3)∈ hs0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ hs0))))), (c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ∈ Top ∧ c3 ∈ ⋃ c1))
  iscnp2(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, ⋃ c1, ⋃ c2)
  eqid(⋃ c1)
  eqid(⋃ c2)
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c4, ((c0 ` c3)∈ hs0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ hs0))), ((c0 ` c3)∈ c4 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ c4))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c4, (c0 ` c3)∈ hs0, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ hs0)), (c0 ` c3)∈ c4, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ c4)))
  eleq2(hs0, c4, (c0 ` c3))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c4, (c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ hs0), (c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ c4))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c4, c3 ∈ s0, (c0 " s0)⊆ hs0, (c0 " s0)⊆ c4)
  sseq2(hs0, c4, (c0 " s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ c2)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ` c3)∈ c4 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧(c0 " s0)⊆ c4))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: lmbr
blocks.content: Express the binary relation "sequence ` F ` converges to point ` P ` " in a topological space. Definition 1.4-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 25. The condition ` F C_ ( CC X. X ) ` allows us to use objects more general than sequences when convenient; see the comment in ~ df-lm . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)

  syl6eleqr(c3, c4, cfv(cuz, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cz)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c3, cz))

  fveq2(cv(hs2), c3, cuz)
  lmbrf(hs0, hs2, hs1, cxp(c4, csn(c2)), c0, c2, c1, c4, c2, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cz)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cz))

  simp2(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cz))
  fvconst2g(c2, c1, cv(hs1), c4)

  diff.hs1.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cz)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs2.c(c3)

thm lmconst(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ)→(c4 × { c2 })[(~~>t ` c0)]c2)
  ⊣ c4 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ), (c4 × { c2 })[(~~>t ` c0)]c2, c2 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ∈ hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c4, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2), c2 ∈ hs0)))))
  ralrimivw(hs0, c0, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ), (c2 ∈ hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c4, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2), c2 ∈ hs0))))
  syl6an((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ), c2 ∈ hs0, ∃(hs2 ∈ c4, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2), c2 ∈ hs0)), c3 ∈ c4, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), c2 ∈ hs0))
  syl6eleqr(c3, c4, (ℤ≥ ` c3), (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ))
  syl((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), c3 ∈ ℤ)
  uzid(c3)
  ralrimdva(hs1, (ℤ≥ ` c3), (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ), c2 ∈ hs0, c2 ∈ hs0)
  idd(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ)∧ hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3)), c2 ∈ hs0)
  rspcev(hs2, c3, c4, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), c2 ∈ hs0), ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2), c2 ∈ hs0))
  raleqdv(hs1, (ℤ≥ ` hs2), (ℤ≥ ` c3), hs2 = c3, c2 ∈ hs0)
  fveq2(hs2, c3, cuz)
  lmbrf(hs0, hs2, hs1, (c4 × { c2 }), c0, c2, c1, c4, c2, c3, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ))
  simp1(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ ℤ)
  simp3(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ ℤ)
  syl((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ), ((c4 × { c2 }): c4 → c1), c2 ∈ c1)
  fconst6g(c2, c1, c4)
  sylan((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ), hs1 ∈ c4, ((c4 × { c2 })` hs1)= c2, c2 ∈ c1)
  simp2(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ ℤ)
  fvconst2g(c2, c1, hs1, c4)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ ℤ))
  diff.hs1.w(c2 ∈ hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)

thm lmcvg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), c2))), wcel(c4, c2))
  rspcdva(hs0, c2, c5, w0, wi(wcel(c4, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), c2)))), wi(wcel(c4, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c4, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c4, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), c2))))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c2, c4)

  eleq2(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))
  syl(w0, wral(hs0, c5, wi(wcel(c4, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))), wral(hs0, c5, wi(wcel(c4, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c1)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))))))
  simp3d(w0, wral(hs0, c5, wi(wcel(c4, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c1)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c1, co(cuni(c5), cpm, cc)), wcel(c4, cuni(c5)))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, co(cuni(c5), cpm, cc)), wcel(c4, cuni(c5)), wral(hs0, c5, wi(wcel(c4, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c1)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))))), wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c5), c4))
  lmbr2(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c5, c4, cuni(c5), c0, c3, w0)
  sylib(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c5))), wcel(c5, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, ctop), wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c5), c4))
  lmrcl(c1, c5, c4)
  toptopon2(c5)
  ralimi(hs0, c5, wi(wcel(c4, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c1)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))), wi(wcel(c4, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))))

  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c5)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, c5)

thm iscnp4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, c1)), wb(wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, ccnp, c2), c4)), wa(wf(c5, c1, c3), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cfv(c5, c4))), wrex(s1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c4)), wss(cima(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, ccnp, c2), c4)), wa(wf(c5, c1, c3), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cfv(c5, c4))), wrex(s1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c4)), wss(cima(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, ccnp, c2), c4)), wa(wf(c5, c1, c3), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cfv(c5, c4))), wrex(s1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c4)), wss(cima(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, ccnp, c2), c4))), wf(c5, c1, c3), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cfv(c5, c4))), wrex(s1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c4)), wss(cima(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cfv(c5, c4))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, ccnp, c2), c4))), wrex(s1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c4)), wss(cima(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))

blocks.name: cnpnei
blocks.content: A condition for continuity at a point in terms of neighborhoods. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Sep-2009.)

blocks.name: cnima
blocks.content: An open subset of the codomain of a continuous function has an open preimage. (Contributed by FL, 15-Dec-2006.)

thm cnima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c3), c1))
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c3), c1), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  simprd(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1)), wf(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wa(wf(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, ctop)))
  iscn2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c3), c1))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), c3, ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c3), c1))
}

blocks.name: cnclima
blocks.content: A closed subset of the codomain of a continuous function has a closed preimage. (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

  sylibd(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(c4 : c1 → c3)), (s0 ∈ P(c3)→((cls ` c0)`(`' c4 " s0))⊆(`' c4 "((cls ` c2)` s0))), (s0 ∈(Clsd ` c2)→(`' c4 " s0)∈(Clsd ` c0)), (s0 ∈(Clsd ` c2)→((cls ` c0)`(`' c4 " s0))⊆(`' c4 "((cls ` c2)` s0))))

thm cnss1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)→(c2[Cn]c3)⊆(c0[Cn]c3))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c2
} = {

  mpbir2and(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3)), hs0 ∈(c0[Cn]c3), (hs0 : c1 → ⋃ c3), ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0))
  adantl((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3), (hs0 : c1 → ⋃ c3))
  cnf(hs0, c2, c3, c1, ⋃ c3)
  eqid(⋃ c3)
  ralrimiva(hs1, c3, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3)), (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0)
  sseldd((`' hs0 " hs1), c0, c2, (((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))∧ hs1 ∈ c3))
  simpllr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ⊆ c0, hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3), hs1 ∈ c3)
  adantll((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3), hs1 ∈ c3, (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c2)
  cnima(hs0, c2, c3, hs1)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3)), (hs0 ∈(c0[Cn]c3)↔((hs0 : c1 → ⋃ c3)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0))), c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c3 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c3))
  simpll(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ⊆ c0, hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
  sylib(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3)), c3 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c3), c3 ∈ Top)
  adantl((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3), c3 ∈ Top)

  diff.hs0.c((c2[Cn]c3))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[Cn]c3))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0))
  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c3)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ c3)

  adantr(c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2), c3 ∈ c4, (c0 : c4 → ⋃ c2))

  expr((c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4), hs0 ∈ c2, (c0 ` c3)∈ hs0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(`' c0 " hs0))))

  ad2ant2r(c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2), c3 ∈ c4, hs0 ∈ c2, (c0 ` c3)∈ hs0, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ c1)
  cnima(c0, c1, c2, hs0)
  mpbir2and(((c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧(c0 ` c3)∈ hs0)), c3 ∈(`' c0 " hs0), c3 ∈ c4, (c0 ` c3)∈ hs0)
  adantr((c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧(c0 ` c3)∈ hs0), c3 ∈ c4)
  simprr((c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4), hs0 ∈ c2, (c0 ` c3)∈ hs0)
  3syl(((c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧(c0 ` c3)∈ hs0)), (c3 ∈(`' c0 " hs0)↔(c3 ∈ c4 ∧(c0 ` c3)∈ hs0)), (c0 : c4 → ⋃ c2), c0[Fn]c4)

  cnf(c0, c1, c2, c4, ⋃ c2)
  ffn(c0, c4, ⋃ c2)
  elpreima(c0, c4, c3, hs0)
  rspcev(hs1, (`' c0 " hs0), c1, c3 ∈(`' c0 " hs0), (c3 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(`' c0 " hs0)))
  bitr3d(hs1 =(`' c0 " hs0), (c3 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(`' c0 " hs0)), c3 ∈(`' c0 " hs0), c3 ∈ hs1)
  biantrud(hs1 =(`' c0 " hs0), c3 ∈ hs1, hs1 ⊆(`' c0 " hs0))
  eqimss(hs1, (`' c0 " hs0))
  eleq2(hs1, (`' c0 " hs0), c3)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c0 ∈((c1[CnP]c2)` c3)↔((c0 : c4 → ⋃ c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,((c0 ` c3)∈ hs0 → ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,(c3 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(`' c0 " hs0))))))), c1 ∈(TopOn ` c4), c2 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c2), c3 ∈ c4)
  sylib((c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4), c1 ∈(TopOn ` c4), c1 ∈ Top)
  adantr(c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2), c3 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ Top)
  cntop1(c0, c1, c2)
  toptopon(c1, c4)
  sylib((c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4), c2 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c2), c2 ∈ Top)

blocks.name: cnsscnp
blocks.content: The set of continuous functions is a subset of the set of continuous functions at a point. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 21-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cncnp
blocks.content: A continuous function is continuous at all points. Theorem 7.2(g) of [Munkres] p. 107. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.content: Equivalence of continuity in the parent topology and continuity in a subspace. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Jul-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cnrest2r
blocks.content: Equivalence of continuity in the parent topology and continuity in a subspace. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2014.)

thm cnrest2r(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, c2)), co(c1, ccn, c0)))

  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, c0)))

  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, c2)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, cin(c2, cuni(c0)))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wss(crn(cv(hs0)), cin(c2, cuni(c0))), wss(cin(c2, cuni(c0)), cuni(c0)))
  frnd(cv(hs0), cin(c2, cuni(c0)), cuni(c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, c2)))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, c2)))), wf(cv(hs0), cuni(c1), cin(c2, cuni(c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(co(c0, crest, cin(c2, cuni(c0))), cfv(ctopon, cin(c2, cuni(c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, cin(c2, cuni(c0))))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, c2)))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, ctop))

  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, co(c0, crest, c2)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))

thm cnrest2r(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))⊆(c1[Cn]c0))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2)), (c1[Cn]c0), c0 ∈ Top)
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2)), hs0 ∈(c1[Cn]c0))
  mpbird((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))), hs0 ∈(c1[Cn]c0), hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0))))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))), (hs0 ∈(c1[Cn]c0)↔ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)))), c0 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c0), ran(hs0)⊆(c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0), (c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)⊆ ⋃ c0)
  frnd(hs0, (c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0), ⋃ c1, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))), (hs0 : ⋃ c1 →(c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)), c1 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c1), (c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0))∈(TopOn `(c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)), hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0))))
  sylib((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))), c1 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c1), c1 ∈ Top)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2)), c1 ∈ Top)
  cntop1(hs0, c1, (c0[|`t]c2))
  toptopon2(c1)
  sylancl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))), (c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0))∈(TopOn `(c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)), c0 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c0), (c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)⊆ ⋃ c0)
  sylib((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))), c0 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c0), c0 ∈ Top)
  simpl(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2)))
  toptopon2(c0)
  resttopon(c0, ⋃ c0, (c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0))
  eleqtrd(hs0, (c1[Cn](c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0))), (c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2)), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))))
  simpr(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2)))
  oveq2d(c1, ccn, (c0[|`t]c2), (c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))))
  3syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))), (c0[|`t]c2)=(c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)), (c0[|`t]c2)∈ Top, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  adantl(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2)), (c0[|`t]c2)∈ Top)
  cntop2(hs0, c1, (c0[|`t]c2))
  restrcl(c0, c2)
  restin(c0, universe, c2, universe, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  cnf2(c1, ⋃ c1, (c0[|`t](c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)), (c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0), hs0)
  a1i((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn](c0[|`t]c2))), (c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0)⊆ ⋃ c0)
  inss2(c2, ⋃ c0)
  cnrest2(c0, ⋃ c0, hs0, (c2 ⋂ ⋃ c0), c1)

  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Top)

blocks.name: cnpresti
blocks.content: One direction of ~ cnprest under the weaker condition that the point is in the subset rather than the interior of the subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)

thm cnpresti(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, cfv(co(c4, ccnp, c5), c2))), wcel(cres(c3, c0), cfv(co(co(c4, crest, c0), ccnp, c5), c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c4))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, cfv(co(c4, ccnp, c5), c2))), wcel(cres(c3, c0), cfv(co(co(c4, crest, c0), ccnp, c5), c2)), wf(cres(c3, c0), c0, cuni(c5)), wral(hs0, c5, wi(wcel(cfv(cres(c3, c0), c2), cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, co(c4, crest, c0), wa(wcel(c2, cv(hs1)), wss(cima(cres(c3, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))))
  fssresd(c3, c0, cuni(c5), c1, w3a(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, cfv(co(c4, ccnp, c5), c2))))

blocks.content: Every function is continuous when the domain is discrete. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

thm cndis(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wf(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), cpw(c0)), wss(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0))

thm cndis(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))→(P(c0)[Cn]c2)=(c3[↦]c0))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (P(c0)[Cn]c2), (c3[↦]c0), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)))
  3bitr4rd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), hs0 ∈(P(c0)[Cn]c2), hs0 ∈(c3[↦]c0), (hs0 : c0 → c3), ((hs0 : c0 → c3)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ P(c0))))
  pm4.71d((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), (hs0 : c0 → c3), ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ P(c0)))
  ex((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), (hs0 : c0 → c3), ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ P(c0)))
  ralrimivw(hs1, c2, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 : c0 → c3)), (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ P(c0))
  mpbird(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 : c0 → c3)), (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ P(c0), (`' hs0 " hs1)⊆ c0)
  syl5sseq((`' hs0 " hs1), c0, dom(hs0), ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 : c0 → c3)))
  cnvimass(hs0, hs1)
  adantl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)), (hs0 : c0 → c3), dom(hs0)= c0)
  fdm(hs0, c0, c3)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), (hs0 : c0 → c3), ((`' hs0 " hs1)∈ P(c0)↔(`' hs0 " hs1)⊆ c0))
  elpw2g(c0, c1, (`' hs0 " hs1))
  syl2anr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), (hs0 ∈(c3[↦]c0)↔(hs0 : c0 → c3)), c3 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ c1)
  toponmax(c2, c3)
  id(c0 ∈ c1)
  elmapg(c3, c2, c0, c1, hs0)
  sylan(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), (hs0 ∈(P(c0)[Cn]c2)↔((hs0 : c0 → c3)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ P(c0)))), P(c0)∈(TopOn ` c0))
  distopon(c0, c1)
  iscn(hs1, P(c0), c0, c2, c3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((P(c0)[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c3[↦]c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3))∧(hs0 : c0 → c3)))
  diff.hs1.c(P(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

  syl5(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpr(emptycls, c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0), wo(wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))

  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)

  syl6eq(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), emptycls, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  imaeq2(cv(hs1), emptycls, ccnv(cv(hs0)))
  ima0(ccnv(cv(hs0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c2), c0))
  eqeltrd(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c2), c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2)))

  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2), wcel(c1, c0))

  elmapg(c2, c3, c1, c0, cv(hs0))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, cpr(emptycls, c2))), wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2), wral(hs1, cpr(emptycls, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0)))), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c2), cfv(ctopon, c2)))

thm cnindis(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[Cn]{ ∅, c2 })=(c2[↦]c1))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0[Cn]{ ∅, c2 }), (c2[↦]c1), (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  3bitr4rd((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3), hs0 ∈(c0[Cn]{ ∅, c2 }), hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c1), (hs0 : c1 → c2), ((hs0 : c1 → c2)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ { ∅, c2 },(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0)))
  pm4.71d((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3), (hs0 : c1 → c2), ∀(hs1 ∈ { ∅, c2 },(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0))
  ex((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3), (hs0 : c1 → c2), ∀(hs1 ∈ { ∅, c2 },(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0))
  ralrimiv(hs1, { ∅, c2 }, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(hs0 : c1 → c2)), (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0)
  syl5(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(hs0 : c1 → c2)), hs1 ∈ { ∅, c2 }, (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0, (hs1 = ∅ ∨ hs1 = c2))
  elpri(hs1, emptycls, c2)
  jaod(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(hs0 : c1 → c2)), hs1 = ∅, hs1 = c2, (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0)
  syl5ibrcom(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(hs0 : c1 → c2)), hs1 = ∅, (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0, ∅ ∈ c0)
  syl(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(hs0 : c1 → c2)), ∅ ∈ c0, c0 ∈ Top)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, (hs0 : c1 → c2), c0 ∈ Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  0opn(c0)
  eleq1d((`' hs0 " hs1), c0, emptycls, hs1 = ∅)
  syl6eq((`' hs0 " hs1), emptycls, (`' hs0 " ∅), hs1 = ∅)
  imaeq2(hs1, emptycls, `' hs0)
  ima0(`' hs0)
  syl5ibrcom(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(hs0 : c1 → c2)), hs1 = c2, (`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0, (`' hs0 " c2)∈ c0)
  eqeltrd((`' hs0 " c2), c0, c1, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧(hs0 : c1 → c2)))
  adantl((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3), (hs0 : c1 → c2), (`' hs0 " c2)= c1)
  fimacnv(hs0, c1, c2)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, (hs0 : c1 → c2), c1 ∈ c0)
  eleq1d((`' hs0 " hs1), c0, (`' hs0 " c2), hs1 = c2)
  imaeq2(hs1, c2, `' hs0)
  syl2anr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, (hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c1)↔(hs0 : c1 → c2)), c2 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ c0)
  id(c2 ∈ c3)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  elmapg(c2, c3, c1, c0, hs0)
  sylan2(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, (hs0 ∈(c0[Cn]{ ∅, c2 })↔((hs0 : c1 → c2)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ { ∅, c2 },(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0))), { ∅, c2 } ∈(TopOn ` c2))
  indistopon(c2, c3)
  iscn(hs1, c0, c1, { ∅, c2 }, c2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[Cn]{ ∅, c2 }))
  diff.hs0.c((c2[↦]c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3))

blocks.content: If ` A ` is an isolated point in ` X ` (or equivalently, the singleton ` { A } ` is open in ` X ` ), then every function is continuous at ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)

  syl12anc(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, c1)), wa(wcel(csn(c4), c0), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c4), cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs2, c0, wa(wcel(c4, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), wcel(csn(c4), c0), wcel(c4, csn(c4)), wss(csn(c4), cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))

blocks.name: paste
blocks.content: Pasting lemma. If ` A ` and ` B ` are closed sets in ` X ` with ` A u. B = X ` , then any function whose restrictions to ` A ` and ` B ` are continuous is continuous on all of ` X ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: lmfpm
blocks.content: If ` F ` converges, then ` F ` is a partial function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmfpm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c2, cfv(clm, c0), c3)), wcel(c2, co(c1, cpm, cc)))
} = {
  simp1d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c2, cfv(clm, c0), c3)), wcel(c2, co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(c3, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, crn(cuz), wf(cres(c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c2, cfv(clm, c0), c3), w3a(wcel(c2, co(c1, cpm, cc)), wcel(c3, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, crn(cuz), wf(cres(c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))))
  lmbr(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c1, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  id(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
}

blocks.name: sslm
blocks.content: A finer topology has fewer convergent sequences (but the sequences that do converge, converge to the same value). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2015.)

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0 ⊆ c2)→(~~>t ` c2)⊆(~~>t ` c0))
} = {
  3sstr4d((~~>t ` c2), (~~>t ` c0), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2)))))}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2)))))}, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0 ⊆ c2))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 ⊆ c2, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2)))))} ⊆ { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2)))))})
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs1, c0 ⊆ c2, (hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2))))), (hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2))))))
  3anim123d(c0 ⊆ c2, hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ), hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2)))), hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ), hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2)))))
  idd(c0 ⊆ c2, hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ))
  idd(c0 ⊆ c2, hs1 ∈ c1)
  ssralv(hs2, c0, c2, (hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2))))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 ⊆ c2, (~~>t ` c2)= { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2)))))})
  lmfval(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c2, c1)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 ⊆ c2, (~~>t ` c0)= { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]ℂ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → ∃(hs3 ∈ ran(ℤ≥),((hs0 |` hs3): hs3 → hs2)))))})
  lmfval(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ c2)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ⊆ c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)

blocks.name: lmres
blocks.content: A function converges iff its restriction to an upper integers set converges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2013.)

  ssid(c4)

  fvex(cuz, c3)
  pmresg(cfv(cuz, c3), universe, c0, c4, cc)
  a1i(w0, wb(wral(hs0, c1, wi(wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))))), wral(hs0, c1, wi(wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))))))
  ralbii(hs0, c1, wi(wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))), wi(wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))))

  elin2(cv(hs1), cdm(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))), cfv(cuz, c3), cdm(c0))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: lmff
blocks.content: If ` F ` converges, there is some upper integer set on which ` F ` is a total function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:

  toponmax(c4, c2)
  mp2b(wb(wrex(hs0, crn(cuz), wf(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, cz, wf(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0))), cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c2))), wf(cuz, cz, cpw(cz)), wfn(cuz, cz))

  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eleqtrd(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), c1), w0)
  lmcls(s0, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  sseqtr4d(c1, c5, cuni(c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c1, cuni(c4)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)))
  cldss(c1, c4, cuni(c4))
  eqid(cuni(c4))
  syl(w0, wceq(c5, cuni(c4)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  toponuni(c4, c5)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), c1), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)))

}

thm lmcld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(TopOn ` c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6[(~~>t ` c4)]c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c6 ` s0)∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(Clsd ` c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eleqtrd(c0, c1, ((cls ` c4)` c1), w0)
  lmcls(s0, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  sseqtr4d(c1, c5, ⋃ c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c4, c1 ∈(Clsd ` c4))
  cldss(c1, c4, ⋃ c4)
  eqid(⋃ c4)
  syl(w0, c5 = ⋃ c4, c4 ∈(TopOn ` c5))
  toponuni(c4, c5)
  syl(w0, ((cls ` c4)` c1)= c1, c1 ∈(Clsd ` c4))
  cldcls(c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: lmcnp
blocks.content: The image of a convergent sequence under a continuous map is convergent to the image of the original point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.)

blocks.name: lmcn
blocks.content: The image of a convergent sequence under a continuous map is convergent to the image of the original point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(clm, c2), cfv(c0, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c4), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)))
} = {
  lmcnp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(co(c4, ccnp, c2), c3)), wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, cuni(c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c3, cuni(c4)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c4))), wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c4), c3))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c4))), wcel(c4, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, ctop), wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)))
  cntop1(c0, c4, c2)
  toptopon2(c4)
  lmcl(c4, cuni(c4), c1, c3)
  cncnpi(c0, c4, c2, c3, cuni(c4))
  eqid(cuni(c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∘ c1)[(~~>t ` c2)](c0 ` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[(~~>t ` c4)]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c4[Cn]c2))
} = {
  lmcnp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈((c4[CnP]c2)` c3), c0 ∈(c4[Cn]c2), c3 ∈ ⋃ c4)
  syl2anc(w0, c3 ∈ ⋃ c4, c4 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c4), c1[(~~>t ` c4)]c3)
  sylib(w0, c4 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c4), c4 ∈ Top)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ Top, c0 ∈(c4[Cn]c2))
  cntop1(c0, c4, c2)
  toptopon2(c4)
  lmcl(c4, ⋃ c4, c1, c3)
  cncnpi(c0, c4, c2, c3, ⋃ c4)
  eqid(⋃ c4)
}
